summary.span: 命名空间包含由 Soapsuds 工具 (Soapsuds.exe) 命令行工具和用户代码使用的类，这些类用于在元数据和远程处理基础结构的 XML 架构之间进行相互转换。

span.span: The namespace contains the classes that are used by the Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe) command-line tool and the user code to convert metadata to and from XML schema for the remoting infrastructure.

summary.span: 此命名空间的一些最重要的类是 类和 类。

span.span: Some of the most important classes of this namespace are the class and the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 远程处理基础结构使用类在服务器端生成 Web 服务描述语言（WSDL）。 The class is used by the remoting infrastructure to generate Web Services Description Language (WSDL) on the server side. 类提供[Soapsuds 工具（Soapsuds）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100))命令行工具的功能，可通过编程方式使用以获得相同的结果。 The class provides the functionality of the [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100)) command-line tool, and can be used programmatically to achieve the same outcome. 类的方法可用于创建 xml 架构，该架构描述源代码中公开的服务，以及从 XML 架构创建C#代码。The methods of the class can be used to create XML schemas that describe services that are exposed in source code, and to create C# code from XML schema.
